definition: shadowboxing or Taiji, T'aichi or T'aichichuan/traditional form of physical exercise or relaxation/a martial art

sentences.english: To play Taijiquan, you have to keep a quiet mind.
sentences.chinese: 打太極拳時，你必須保持內心平靜。

sentences.english: It has a good effect on life preservation and cure.
sentences.chinese: 心意太極拳對養生和防病治病有很好的功效。

sentences.english: Practicing Quan is to calm your mind.
sentences.chinese: 太極拳更重視修身養性，心神安靜。

sentences.english: Taijiquan is an especially helpful exercise to both old and young.
sentences.chinese: 太極拳是一種老少皆宜的運動。

sentences.english: B: Yes. I do one set of shadow-boxing every morning after I get up.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我每天早上起來都打一趟太極拳。

sentences.english: Taijijian (literally "Taiji Sword") is a straight two-edged sword used in the training of the Chinese martial art Taijiquan.
sentences.chinese: 太極劍是筆直的雙刃劍，用於中國武術太極拳訓練。

sentences.english: The Taijiquan class is at Garden Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 太極拳訓練班在花園酒店舉辦。

sentences.english: First , let's enjoy an amazing kongfu show from the association of Taijiquan .
sentences.chinese: 下面讓我們來欣賞來自太極拳協會的武術和太極表演。

sentences.english: Jun Baoling realizes recipe, achieve a shadowboxing, incognito Zhang Sanfeng.
sentences.chinese: 君寶領悟祕訣，創出太極拳，改名張三丰。

sentences.english: Such was the fascinating shadowboxing that went on at nanking .
sentences.chinese: 在南京持續打的就是這樣令人眼花繚亂的太極拳。

sentences.english: Mr. Muir of Victoria, Canada visited Daqingshan with his Taiji group.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大維多利亞太極拳團由戈登先生帶領訪問大青山。

sentences.english: I went to the Nan Xiang with my friends from the Tai Ji group yesterday morning.
sentences.chinese: 昨天上午我和太極拳隊的朋友們來到了南翔。

sentences.english: Don't overextend a punch while shadow boxing.
sentences.chinese: 不要過分擴展一衝而太極拳。

sentences.english: Shadowboxing is good for many things.
sentences.chinese: 打太極拳的好處是很多。

sentences.english: In 2005, Sichuan Province, Tai Chi sword competition won first prize.
sentences.chinese: 2005年四川省太極拳比賽獲太極刀一等獎。

sentences.english: Chenjiagou is the birthplace of Chen Taichiquan in the Henan province.
sentences.chinese: 陳式太極拳的誕生地是河南省陳家溝。

definition: the Absolute or Supreme Ultimate, the source of all things according to some interpretations of Chinese mythology

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
Chinese national culture/studies of ancient Chinese civilization/the Imperial College (history)
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk
(of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
